animeTitle: Shounen Ninja Kaze no Fujimaru: Nazo no Arabiya Ningyou
animeDescription: Kidnapped and rescued by a Ninja, Fujimaru has mastered martial arts over the years. Now he sets off on a journey to find his mother and also locate an old tome containing secret martial arts techniques.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Yabuki Kimio', ['Episode Director']], ['Shirato Sanpei', ['Original Creator']], ['Hattori Kouichi', ['Music']], ['Kusube Daikichirou', ['Animation Director']]]
